name: city-of-mist
description: City of Mist system for Foundry VTT

scripts.build: rm -r dist; tsc && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.css src/**/*.json src/**/*.png src/**/*.webp src/**/*.html src/**/*.hbs src/**/*.mp3 src/**/*.wav src/**/*.otf src/**/*.woff2 src/**/*.ttf src/**/*.gif dist/ && copyfiles README.md dist/

author: taragnor
